gurmukhi: dlhw piRQm bKwn kY AMqXwNqk kO dyhu ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInH cqur icq lyhu ]410]
transliteration: Dalhaa Pritham Bakhaan Kai Antyaantak Kau Deh(u)|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Chihn Chatur Chit Leh(u)||410||
translation: The names of Paash are formed by uttering “Dalhaa” in the beginning and then adding “Antyantak”, which O wise men ! You may recognize in your mind.410.

gurmukhi: piRqnwNqk pd piRQm kih AMqXwNqk ky dIn ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cqur lIjIAhu cIn ]411]
transliteration: Pritnaantak Pad Pritham Kah(i) Antyaantak Ke Deen|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Chatur Leejeeauh Cheen||411||
translation: The names of Paash are formed by uttering the word “Preetnantak” in the beginning and then adding “Antyantak”, which O wise men ! You may recognize.411.

gurmukhi: DujnI Air pd piRQm kih AMqXwNqkih aucwir ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwir ]412]
transliteration: Dhujniar(i) Pad Pritham Kah(i) Antyaantak(i) Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Suddaar(i)||412||
translation: Saying the word “Dhujni-arei” primarily and then adding “Antyantak”, the names of Paash are formed, which O poets ! comprehend correctly. 412.

gurmukhi: Awid bwhnI Sbd kih irp Air Sbd bKwn ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cIn lyhu mqvwn ]413]
transliteration: Aadh Baahanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Shabad Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheen Lehu Matvaan||413||
translation: Uttering the word “Vaahini” and then saying “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the names of Paash are formed.413.

gurmukhi: bwhn Awid bKwin kY irp Air bhur bKwn ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInH lyhu buiDvwn ]414]
transliteration: Baahan Aadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Bahur Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheehn Lehu Budh(i)vaan||414||
translation: Saying “Vaahan” in the beginning and then “Ripu Ari”, the names of Paash are formed, which O wise men ! You may recognize.414.

gurmukhi: sYnw Awid aucwir kY irpu Air bhur bKwin ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu cqur pCwn ]415]
transliteration: Sainaa Aadh Oucdaar(i) Kai Rip(u) Ar(i) Bahur Bakhaan(i)|| Naam Paas Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Chatur Pachhaad||415||
translation: The names of Paash are formed by uttering the word “Senaa” firstly and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! You may recognize them.415.

gurmukhi: hXnI Awid bKwn kY AMqXMqk ky dIn ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cqur lIjIAhu cIn ]416]
transliteration: Hayaniaadh Bakhaan Kai Artyaantak Ke Deen|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Chatur Leejeeauh Cheen||416||
translation: The names of Paash are formed by uttering “Hayani” in the beginning and then adding “Antyantak”, which O wise men ! You may recognize.416.

gurmukhi: gYnI Awid bKwn kY AMqXMqk Air dyhu ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInH cqur icq lyhu ]417]
transliteration: Gadniaadh Bakhaan Kai Antyaantak Ar(i) Deh(u)|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheehn Chatur Chit Leh(u)||417||
translation: The name of Paash are formed by uttering the word “Gayani” firstly and then adding the words “Antyantak Ari”.417.

gurmukhi: piqnI Awid bKwn kY Air pd bhur aucwir ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN jwn lyhu inrDwr ]418]
transliteration: Patiniaadh Bakhaan Kai Ar(i) Pad Bahur Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Jaan Lehu Nirdhaar||418||
translation: Saying “Patini” in the beginning and then uttering the word “Ari”, the names of Paash are formed, which you may comprehend clearly.418.

gurmukhi: rQnI Awid bKwn kY irpu Air AMq aucwr ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]419]
transliteration: Rathaniaadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Sabi Sudhaar||419||
translation: Saying the word “Rathni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, O poets ! know the names of Paash correctly.419.

gurmukhi: niRpxI Awid bKwn kY irp iKp bhur aucwr ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]420]
transliteration: Nripaniaadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Khip Bahout Ouchaar|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Sabi Sudhaar||420||
translation: Saying “Nrapani” in the beginning and then adding the word “Ripu”, the names of Paash are known correctly.420.

gurmukhi: BtnI Awid bKwn kY irp Air bhur bKwn ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cInhu pR`gXwvwn ]421]
transliteration: Bhataniaadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Bahur Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheenoh Praggyaavaan||421||
translation: Saying word “Bhatani” in the beginning and then adding “ripu Ari” O talented ones! The names of Paash are formed.421.

gurmukhi: Awid bIrxI Sbd kih irp Air bhur bKwn ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cIn lyhu miqvwn ]422]
transliteration: Aadh Bderanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Bahur Bakhaan|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheen Lehu Mat(i)vaan||422||
translation: Uttering the word “Veerni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, the names of Paash are formed, which O wise men ! You may reognise.422.

gurmukhi: S`qRix Awid bKwn kY irp Air puin pd dyhu ]nwm pwNs ky hoq hYN cuqr lIjIAhu cIn ]424]
transliteration: Shattran(i) Aadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Poun(i) Pad Deh(u)|| Naam Paans Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Chit Leh(u)||423||
translation: Saying the word “Shatruni” in the beginning and then adding the words “Ripu Ari”, the names of Paash are formed, which O wise men ! You may recognize.423.
